product_name: Royal Robbins Quebec Sport Crew Sweater - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The Royal Robbins Quebec Sport crew sweater has ribbing on the shoulders and sleeves for sporty style that's polished enough for work or school and perfect for your favorite watering hole. Acrylic/cotton blend is lightweight, durable and feels soft against skin. Royal Robbins Quebec Sport Crew sweater featues a contemporary fit that skims the body without being tight. Closeout.
short_description: The Royal Robbins Quebec Sport crew sweater has ribbing on the shoulders and sleeves for sporty style that's polished enough for work or school and perfect for your favorite watering hole.
